@juunamelie It's not worth, and that's why I despise this stuff so much. I get people have kinks, whether they are just different biological preferences or bizarre fetishes. But sex isn't everything, throwing your whole life away for a kink sounds ridiculously stupid. It's no different from some kinds of drug usage. And then these doujin sell it as the best thing ever. Some people say that it's just some random jerk material, but if that's the case, why bother creating specifically this kind of story? Could as well just throw dice to decide between other, milder generic plots. No... These plots are meant to be read by people who actually project themselves on one of the characters, or else there would be absolutely no reason for these ridiculous and boring plots even to exist.

the major problem I have with NTR (besides it being thinly veiled social commentary) is how predictable it gets. its like watching a boxing match and you always know who the winner and loser is before the match even starts. so even if the art is great and the sex looks good, its gets very repetitive. put some imagination in! (maybe thats asking too much? I'm not sure how much control porn artists in Japan have over what they put out) make it feel like something is really at stake and the outcome is not predetermined. maybe I'm in the minority. fans of NTR, do you enjoy always knowing how a story is going to to end? is that predictability part of the appeal? personally I like a story to at least seem like it could go a number of ways. also, that forced bullshit isn't good writing. they have go out of their way to make the guy being cucked seem like he always deserves it. that's a lame cop-out. I know its not a shonen battle manga, but lets see a real fight every now and then!

I get that it's only a fetish, but I can't help but think that you must be a little pathetic to be into this. No matter if you're self-inserting as the guy who gets NTRd or as the one who NTRs him, it is still pretty sad in a way. It's obvious why it would be bad to self-insert as the cuck, but even if you see yourself as the other guy, it isn't any better because you're identifying with a guy who basically needs magical powers to get laid, who has nothing going for him that could help him attract woman and can only compete with other men through the use of mental control or some bullshit hentai logic like in this case. Either way, no matter who you self-insert as, you're still viewing yourself as someone who is not worthy of getting laid.
